#include<iostream>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        int a[10];
        for(int j=0;j<10;j++)
            cin>>a[j];
        int min_index=-1;
        int minimum=INT_MAX/2;
        for(int j=0;j<10;j++)
        {
            if(a[j]<minimum){
                minimum=a[j];
                min_index=j;
            }
        }
        if(min_index==0){
                int min_index2=-1;
           for(int j=1;j<10;j++)
        {
            if(a[j]==minimum){
                min_index2=j;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(min_index2>-1){
         for(int j=0;j<minimum+1;j++)
            cout<<min_index2;
        }
        else
        {
         cout<<"1";
         for(int j=0;j<minimum+1;j++)
                cout<<min_index;
        }
        cout<<endl;
                }
                else
                {
                    for(int j=0;j<minimum+1;j++)
                        cout<<min_index;
                    cout<<endl;
                }
    }
    return 0;
}
